# Services{-}

LADAL offers services that are available to institutions, businesses, teams, or people. These services include:

+ Access to additional resources

+ Presentations 

+ Workshops

If you are interested or wouldliek to learn more, please contact the LADAL by writing an emial to: 

# Consultation{-}

In addition, LADAL offers consultations on matters relating to language data analysis. If you are a student or staff of the School of Languages and Cultures at UQ, these consultations are free. If you are not a affiliated with the School of Languages and Cultures at UQ, the fees for consultations depend on the complexity and workload that is associated with the consultation.
